message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe will be highly valuable to you. Given its unique features and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,350,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please feel free to share your thoughts.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, I am currently working within a budget that limits my spending to $1,200,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer at this amount if possible.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer and understand your budget considerations.  I'm willing to move a bit closer to your price, how about we settle at $1,275,000? This feels like a fair compromise that acknowledges the value this product brings.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter your offer at $1,250,000. This price still allows me to stay within my budget while acknowledging the value of the product.
